name: Bagelbot
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 32 and has been rated #17  overall.
A 48-hour game jam which only one person is required to make a game from scratch.

[ Entry on Ludum Dare ] #bagelbot

Bagelbot is a wild mix of the classic Dig Dug, Super Crate Box and the creator's crazy fanatics. Combined with a unexpecting theme: Bagelbot.

Feed the khreatures ravaging into the Cafe and feed them bagels until they are so very satisfied, they pop right out! Be careful, they are also after the staff area so better keep that defended.

Collect sponges, fill them up with water to keep yourself going on! Get tips to increase your salary! How long can you last on your shift?

Default Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space/Up - Jump
  • Mouse Left - Bake Bagel
  • Mouse Right - Drink Sponge
  • Mouse Scroll Down - Gather Water

Tip: If a khreature is fed, they won't hurt you until they go hungry and run again!

QUESTIONS:
If you have any questions, hit me up @furriKira on Twitter.
